channel.title: Drafts on don't just talk agile - walk agile!
channel.description: Recent content in Drafts on don't just talk agile - walk agile!

item.title: Why names in programs matter
item.description: I would like to play around a bit with the go programming language. It is not a bad idea to learn a new programming language every once in a while to get to know different ways of thinking about computational problems. I did that extensively in the first years of my professional career when I was working abroad and had a lot of time during my lonely hotel nights. I do it very little today where I prefer to spend my free time with my family.
